name: Shimano Deore XT CS-M8000 11 Speed 11-42 Cassette
description: Lightweight and durable, this 11-speed Shimano XT cassette will give you the gearing to tackle the steeps, up and down.42T cog is made of aluminum while the others are made of steel.2 aluminum spiders keep the weight low.Compatible with HG-X 11-speed chains.Compatible with 2x11 and 1x11 drivetrains.11-13-15-17-19-21-24-28-32-37-42T.
